name: Super Minecraft 64
description:
This is a Minecraft fangame with some Super Mario 64 gameplay mechanics made in Unity3D during my free time. No copyright infringement intended, just a fun little hobby project I have been working on.

Goal

Basically, collect all 7 diamonds by preforming different tasks in the world to win the game. The true goal is to see how fast you can be the game. I know there are some really good platformer people on the internet, and I cant wait to see the parkour or speed running times you will manage.

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move, mouse to rotate camera, and space to jump. Press E to see the diamond hints / tasks. For right now, JKL keys change settings until I add proper settings menu to the game. Press R and ESC to reset and close the game respectively. P for pause / settings menu in game.

Future Development

Currently, there is only one level which is ripped from the Pack.PNG seed, but if this game gets some love I might add more levels in the future. My schedule can be kind of wacky, so please don't expect regular updating, as this is just a hobby project.

System Requirements

Warning, currently a heavily unoptimized game that needs improvement, and a good pc to run. I was able to get a solid 60 FPS with a gaming pc, but really bad FPS on my college laptop. Size is still to be determined. About 36 MB of data space.

Thanks for playing.
